item.title: Simple uses of the vagalumeR package
item.description: The website https://www.vagalume.com.br is where we can obtain information about songs and their lyrics (with translations, when theyâ€™re not in portuguese). This same website has an API, which can be accessed in R, through the vagalumeR package. Here, we have some demonstrations about the functionalities of the package, focusing on the analysis of music lyrics. # Package loading library(vagalumeR) library(tidyverse) library(tm) library(lattice) library(lexiconPT) library(latticeExtra) library(wordcloud) library(networkD3) packageVersion("vagalumeR") [1] '0.
